title: Fantastic Four
tagline: 4 times the action. 4 times the adventure. 4 times the fantastic.
overview: During a space voyage, four scientists are altered by cosmic rays: Reed Richards gains the ability to stretch his body; Sue Storm can become invisible; Johnny Storm controls fire; and Ben Grimm is turned into a super-strong â€¦ thing. Together, these "Fantastic Four" must now thwart the evil plans of Dr. Doom and save the world from certain destruction.
companies: Kumar Mobiliengesellschaft mbH & Co. Projekt Nr. 3 KG
